newsitem.title: USA: Homegate Hospitality proposes IPO terms.
newsitem.headline: Homegate Hospitality proposes IPO terms.

text.p: Homegate Hospitality Inc proposed terms for its initial public offering of 4.325 million shares expected to price in an estimated range of $11 to $13 each, according to a regulatory filing.
The company has proposed to trade on the Nasdaq under the symbol HMGT.O. Its IPO is due in mid-October, according to lead underwriter Bear Stearns.
The company develops extended-stay hotels. It said it plans to have about 65 hotels open or under construction by the end of 1998, according to its prospectus.
